item.title: Creating the Warming Stripes in Matplotlib
item.description: Ed Hawkins made this impressively simple plot to show how global temperatures have risen since 1880. Here is how to recreate it using matplotlib.

item.title: Using Matplotlib to Advocate for Postdocs
item.description: Advocating is all about communicating facts clearly. I used Matplotlib to show the financial struggles of postdocs in the Boston area.
